Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.controllers

Class ExpertController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.controllers.Controller
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.controllers.ExpertController
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class ExpertController extends Controller
The ExpertController handles messages which represent commands received from all the clients and changes the model's state when the game is played with expert rules

  • Field Summary

    Method handleCharacter handles the choice of a Character card : it triggers the correct method relying on the description of the received card.
    void
    propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
    Method propertyChange updates the virtual view according to the events received by the model
    void
    sendFullView()
    Method sendFullView is used to send to all the active clients the three Character cards that can be played during the game.
    void
    visit(ChooseColor m)
    Method visit is used to apply the Character effect that allows to choose the color that adds no influence during the influence calculation (in case the active Character is the 9th one) or the color of three students that must be removed from the player's hall (in case the active character is 12th one) or the color of the student that must be moved from the card to the player's hall (in case the active Character is the 11th one)
    void
    visit(ChooseIsland m)
    Method visit is used to apply the Character effect that allows to calculate the influence on the chosen island (in case the active Character is the third one) or to place a No Entry tile on the chosen island (in case the active Character is the 5th one)
    void
    visit(ChooseTwoColors m)
    Method visit is used to apply the Character effect that allows to switch up to 2 students between player's hall and entrance (in case the active Character is the 10th one) or to switch up to 3 students between player's entrance and the card (in case the active Character is the 7th one)

  • Method Details

    • createModel

      public void createModel(GameParams m)
      Method createExpertModel receives in input the number of players participating in the game and creates a new ExpertGameBoard instance.
      Overrides:
      createModel in class Controller
      Parameters:
      m - - the number of players and first player's info

    • handleCharacter

      public void handleCharacter(Request m, String nickname)
      Method handleCharacter handles the choice of a Character card : it triggers the correct method relying on the description of the received card. If the command sent by the client is valid the model's state can be changed, otherwise an error message is sent to the client identified by his nickname
      Overrides:
      handleCharacter in class Controller
      Parameters:
      m - Request message sent by a Client
      nickname - the nickname of the Player associated with the Client

    • visit

      public void visit(PlayCharacter msg)
      Method visit activates a Character card's ability. The Character can't be played at the beginning of the player's turn before the Planning phase has been completed. it also can't be played if the player doesn't have enough coins to activate the chosen card.
      Overrides:
      visit in class Controller
      Parameters:
      msg - - Character which ability will be activated

    • visit

      public void visit(SpecialMoveIsland m)
      Method visit is used to apply the Character effect that allows to move a student from the card to an island
      Overrides:
      visit in class Controller
      Parameters:
      m - - request which contains the color of the student and the index of the island where he is moved

    • visit

      public void visit(ChooseIsland m)
      Method visit is used to apply the Character effect that allows to calculate the influence on the chosen island (in case the active Character is the third one) or to place a No Entry tile on the chosen island (in case the active Character is the 5th one)
      Overrides:
      visit in class Controller
      Parameters:
      m - - request which contains the index of the island

    • visit

      public void visit(ChooseColor m)
      Method visit is used to apply the Character effect that allows to choose the color that adds no influence during the influence calculation (in case the active Character is the 9th one) or the color of three students that must be removed from the player's hall (in case the active character is 12th one) or the color of the student that must be moved from the card to the player's hall (in case the active Character is the 11th one)
      Overrides:
      visit in class Controller
      Parameters:
      m - - request which contains the chosen color

    • visit

      public void visit(ChooseTwoColors m)
      Method visit is used to apply the Character effect that allows to switch up to 2 students between player's hall and entrance (in case the active Character is the 10th one) or to switch up to 3 students between player's entrance and the card (in case the active Character is the 7th one)
      Overrides:
      visit in class Controller
      Parameters:
      m - - request which contains the two chosen colors
